title: City Chic Women's Apparel Women's Plus Size Contour Balconette Bra with Lace Overlay
features: Lace: 90% Nylon, 10% Elastane; Main Fabric: 72% Nylon, 28% Elastane; Mesh: 78% Nylon, 22% Elastane; Cup Lining: 100% Polyester
description: Luxury & versatility combine in the elodie contour bra. Constructed by a feel good, soft & romantic crochet look Lace. Key features include: - contour balconette fit, full coverage cups - underwire support - lightly lined to shape & lift bust - adjustable shoulder straps with back lace detail - back hook allows bra straps to also be worn as a racer back style - side boning for stability - padded triple back fastening - delicate crochet look Lace overlay - stretch mesh wide back for smooth supportive shaping - thick center front lace paneling
